summary: This is an automatic email reply from an individual who is in Dallas for depositions through August 23, 2019, and mentions that 'Shanks' is covering for them. The email is in response to 'Epstein-Related Touhy Requests'.

persons.name: Shanks
persons.context: Mentioned as the person covering duties for the email sender while they are away for depositions.

events.title: Automatic reply sent regarding Epstein Touhy requests
events.description: An automatic email reply is sent indicating the sender is in Dallas for depositions and will be unavailable through August 23, 2019.

events.title: Depositions scheduled to conclude
events.description: The email indicates the sender's depositions in Dallas are scheduled to conclude on this date.

keyFacts: The document is an automatic email reply dated August 20, 2019, related to 'Epstein-Related Touhy Requests'.
The email sender states they are in Dallas for depositions through August 23, 2019.
A person named 'Shanks' is mentioned as covering for the sender during their absence.
